archiveDescription: Tēnei mea te Rua Mahara. He wāhi pupuri, tuhi, uru hoki ki ōu nei purākau
storyDescription: Ko te Pakiwaitara/Purākau, he kōrero matihiko e hiranga ana ki te tētahi, ki tētahi hapori rānei. Inarā he kōrero whakapapa, he kōrero ahurea rānei. Ko ēnei he kōrero pēnei i ngā maharatanga, he hitori, he purākau, he takamahi, he pakaiwaitara rānei.
archiveTypes: E rua ngā momo rua mahara ki roto i a Āhau
personalArchive: Ko tāu rua mahara, kua muna katoatia, a, kua whakamuna hoki ki tāu ake taputapu hangarau. Kia whakaritea tāu pūkete, ka whakaritea hoki tāu rua mahara
whanauArchive: Kohinga Mahara: He rua mahara kua whakamunatia. E āhei ana te hunga e whakaae anake kia uru. Ko ērā whanaunga e whakaae anake e uru. Kia hangaia he iwi hou. ka hangaia hoki he kohinga Hapori
createRecord: Kia whakaritea he pūranga. Nāu anō te mana kia kōwhirihia ko tewhea te rua mahara ka noho ai tāu pūranga ma te tini i te mana uru ki a koe, ko tētahi rōpu e noho ana koe.
itemsStories: rau atu he purākau mai i ngā pūranga ki te kohinga nei
itemsArtefacts: tāpirihia ngā taonga me ngā pāpāho ki ngā kōrero
itemsViewAll: tiro i o kōrero katoa i te wāhi kotahi
itemsIndividual: tiro i ngā kōrero takitahi mo etahi atu kōrero
